tool_description: Global Wine Score is designed as a REST API for multiple clients: you can use it for your web app on computers as well as any mobile devices. A client is a program that will consume our API, that will use its endpoints and returned data. You can do pretty much anything our web client can. This will be most useful to integrate Global Wine Score capabilities into your own website, with your own layout and your own way of managing rights. Search for a wine by name. The API returns 1 unique score...
name: Global Wine Score
title: Global Wine Score

api_list.name: Latest GWS

optional_parameters.name: wine_id
optional_parameters.description: The exact id of the wine. Can be used multiple times (e.g ?wine_id=114959&wine_id=114952)

optional_parameters.name: vintage
optional_parameters.description: The vintage you want to search against. Example: 2000

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: The capitalized color of the wine. (Red, White, or Pink)

optional_parameters.name: is_primeurs
optional_parameters.description: Only show the en primeur Global Wine Scores

optional_parameters.name: lwin
optional_parameters.description: L-WIN wine identifier from Liv-Ex. Example: 1014033.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results. Example: 100

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 100.

optional_parameters.name: ordering
optional_parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results. Possible values: date, -date, score, -score

api_list.name: Historical GWS

optional_parameters.name: wine_id
optional_parameters.description: The exact id of the wine. Can be used multiple times (e.g ?wine_id=114959&wine_id=114952)

optional_parameters.name: vintage
optional_parameters.description: The vintage you want to search against. Example: 2000

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: The capitalized color of the wine. Possible values:  Red, White, Pink

optional_parameters.name: is_primeurs
optional_parameters.description: Only show the en primeur Global Wine Scores

optional_parameters.name: lwin
optional_parameters.description: L-WIN wine identifier from Liv-Ex. Example: 1014033

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per page. Default: 100

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results. Example: 100

optional_parameters.name: ordering
optional_parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results. Possible values: date, -date, score, -score
